## Crawler.crawl() method

Start crawling the specified frontier.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
crawl(frontier: Frontier, options?: Crawler.crawl.Options): AsyncIterable<Result<Page, [URL, string]>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  frontier | [Frontier](./alfa-frontier.frontier_class.md) |  |
|  options | [Crawler.crawl.Options](./alfa-crawler.crawler_namespace.crawl_namespace.options_interface.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

AsyncIterable&lt;[Result](./alfa-result.result_interface.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Page](./alfa-web.page_class.md)<!-- -->, \[[URL](./alfa-url.url_class.md)<!-- -->, string\]&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Crawling stops once the frontier has no additional URLs in queue.
